title: Gold level mid laner looking for serious team.
body:
Hi all prospective teammates! I would like to try out for your team(s) and I'm looking forward to playing with you. I've been playing since season 2 and i'm finally looking to step up my game and really improve as a player. I hope you take me into consideration for your team, it would be a blast!


IGN: LostBast
Solo q rank this/ last season: Gold V now / Silver 1 finish last season
Role: Midlaner - Mage style of play
Age and Time Zone: 21 & EST & Available times: evenings
Champs: Annie, Lissandra, Vel'Koz and Azir.
I've played with my friends for a while (see: years), and I find that their goals in the game don't match with mine which is improving and honing skills to someday reach a skill level that I am quite happy with. I like to have fun while I'm doing it too, hell, it's a game after all!

-LB
